about.title: About me
paragraphs: I'm a versatile software engineer with a passion for creating quality products. Over the years, I've honed my skills in web development, team management, and process automation. Whether I'm streamlining operations or developing modern applications, I bring creativity, precision, and dedication to every project. Outside of coding, I'm a proud chicken dad, a PC builder, and a beginner gardener.

next.title: What's next
paragraphs: I'm excited to return to the tech industry and continue my journey as a software engineer. Although I spent the past several years focused on entrepreneurship, I never stepped away from my passion for programming. Throughout this time, I actively worked on projects to stay up to date with industry trends and explore new technologies like Svelte, Firebase, and React 19. My entrepreneurial experience has taught me how to be both a more effective leader and team-player to adapt and deliver impactful solutions. I'm eager to combine these skills with my technical expertise to tackle challenging problems, collaborate with forward-thinking teams, and create technology that drives meaningful change.
